input.Client Request: I'd like to add a button to the home page, just below the hero, that links to the Services page.

full_output.task_name: Add Services CTA Button Below Hero Section
full_output.description_markdown:
## 📝 Task Summary Add a prominent call-to-action button below the hero section on the home page that links to the Services page. ## 🛠 Technical Context - **Platform:** WordPress with Elementor - **Client:** thebusinessbeanstalk.co.uk - **Colour Scheme:** Primary: #ff0000 (Red), Secondary: #0000ff (Blue) - **Scope:** Home page modification only - **Service Level:** 2 (Standard) ## 📋 Execution Steps 1. Log into WordPress admin dashboard for thebusinessbeanstalk.co.uk 2. Navigate to the home page and open it in Elementor editor 3. Locate the hero section and identify the insertion point directly below it 4. Add a new Button widget from the Elementor library 5. Configure button text to "View Our Services" (or similar CTA text) 6. Set button link to the Services page URL 7. Style the button using the brand colours: - Background: Primary Red (#ff0000) - Text: White or contrasting colour for readability - Hover state: Secondary Blue (#0000ff) or darkened red 8. Adjust button sizing and spacing for visual hierarchy 9. Preview the changes on desktop and mobile viewports 10. Publish the changes to the live site ## 📊 Logic Flow ```mermaid flowchart TD A["Open WordPress Admin"] --> B["Navigate to Home Page"] B --> C["Open in Elementor Editor"] C --> D["Locate Hero Section"] D --> E["Insert Button Widget Below Hero"] E --> F["Configure Button Text & Link"] F --> G["Apply Brand Styling
Red #ff0000 Background"] G --> H["Set Hover State
Blue #0000ff"] H --> I["Test Responsive Design"] I --> J["Publish Changes"] ```
checklist: Button widget added below hero section
Button text set to appropriate CTA (e.g., 'View Our Services')
Button linked to Services page
Button styled with primary red background (#ff0000)
Button text colour set for readability (white or high contrast)
Hover state configured with secondary blue (#0000ff)
Button spacing and sizing optimized for visual hierarchy
Responsive design tested on mobile and desktop
Changes published to live site
Client approval obtained

Red #ff0000 Background"] G --> H["Set Hover State
Blue #0000ff"] H --> I["Test Responsive Design"] I --> J["Publish Changes"]
